import React from 'react'; import './Cart.css' const Cart = ({ cart }) => { let total = 0; for (const game of cart) { total+=game.time } return (

Rafiqul Ala Mahid

Developer

Favourite Games:

Cricket, Football, Chess, Tennis

Add some break

Games Cost Details

Game time:

{total}s

Break time:

0s

); }; export default Cart;
